Package hu.bme.mit.theta.xcfa.analysis.portfolio.statistics

Class ModelStatistics

java.lang.Object
hu.bme.mit.theta.xcfa.analysis.portfolio.statistics.ModelStatistics
public class ModelStatistics extends Object
Class that extracts statistical information out of the input C program and the (X)CFA and is capable of outputting it in a csv (one line, that can be merged with other, similar csvs) and txt (human readable) output
